txt.en: Dréri can be found in the Hall Under the Mountain.\n\nYou have gathered a great deal of meat from the beasts of the north and should now return to Dréri.

Slabs of boar meat can be obtained from boars of the north. Cuts of venison can be obtained from deer of the north.\n\nDréri has asked you to aid the Stout-axes in hunting the beasts of the north in an effort to replenish their food-stores.

'Greetings, [placeholder]!

'Can you believe this place? It still seems a dream to me! What can I do for you?'

You explain that King Thorin has asked the Stout-axes for their aid in return for granting them a new home in Erebor.

'Well, that is a bit of a coincidence! I sent out several of our number to hunt the beasts of the North. It seemed to me that we should fill our own food-stores, and we Stout-axes are more than capable of a simple hunt.

'However, your aid would still be most welcome. Bring me as many cuts of boar meat and venison as you can!'
Dréri hopes to lessen the burden of the Stout-axes' sudden arrival on the Dwarves of Erebor.
Deliver the meat to Dréri in Erebor
